law.catch_line: This title and Title 12 of this article do not prohibit a qualified organization from conducting a g...
law.text:
This title and Title 12 of this article do not prohibit a qualified organization from conducting a gaming event for the exclusive benefit of a qualified organization if an individual or group of individuals does not:
benefit financially from the gaming event under this subtitle; or
receive any of the proceeds from the gaming event under this subtitle for personal use or benefit.
